overview: Dive into adventure with your favorite underwater explorers, the Octonauts! Join brave Captain Barnacles, daredevil ex-pirate, Kwazii and medic Peso Penguin, along with the other Octonauts as they explore the world s oceans, rescue the creatures who live there and protect their habitats above and below the waves! On this exciting DVD, join the Octonauts as they must figure out how to get a gigantic saltwater crocodile back to his warm water home without anyone getting chomped by him! Peso and Tweak try to remove a stuck Hermit Crab from its shell. Kwazii covets the treasure in a sunken pirate ship - but it's protected by slime-squirting Slime Eels! Enjoy these adventures and more with the Octonauts!
title: Octonauts - Crocodiles & Crabs
